intervention.name: Rebecca Harms
intervention.p: Mr President, yesterday we received very sad news from Grozny in Chechnya. The journalist Natalia Estemirova, who was well known to everyone in our group, was murdered there. She was found dead just beyond the border between Chechnya and Ingushetia after being kidnapped in Grozny. Natalia Estemirova was extremely committed to her work for Memorial in Chechnya. We would ask you to agree to our request to remember this very committed journalist and pioneering fighter for freedom and human rights in Chechnya by observing a minuteâ€™s silence.

(After the speech by Mrs Harms, see item 4.1). Yes, Mrs Harms. Regarding the matter that you have just mentioned, I must inform the House that President Buzek has made a public statement, which I will read to you.
